'''Słowa, rzeczy, krajobrazy''' (''Words, Things, Landscapes'') is a Polish-language book, containing some 60 reviews of which "Spojrzenie z zewnątrz" (''A View from the Outside'') treats ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.<ref>Bertenstam, Åke. ''[http://www.forodrim.org/bibliography/tolklist.html A Chronological Bibliography of Books About Tolkien]''</ref>
